reviews.review_msg: Great prof! He's organised and enthusiastic and always available for help. His lessons are clear and assignments are fairly easy.

David is m√©ga cool. He made coming to class enjoyable. He taught our class things that were outside of the course description, which we could actually apply/use in daily life. He is hilarious, encouraging, intelligent and willing to help his students. I will never forget this course because he made it so much fun! One of my favourite profs/people.

David is an angel. He is so helpful and genuine. He cares about the success of his students and is always there to help and make sure you're on track. David makes it so much easier to learn another language, and he's hilarious! Never a dull moment. Would definitely recommend him.
David is one of the best French teachers I have ever had. He is very helpful and fair.

Best French Professor Ever!!! I have never enjoyed coming to French but David makes it fun and engaging I highly recommend this prof. He really cares about trying to get his students to succeed in a department that more or less ruins GPA. David c'est fantastic!!!

Claire takes time to genuinely give feedback on your homework, however participation and paying attention in class will haunt you as she picks on individuals to speak up during lecture. She cares about how students do and provides really helpful insight when asked.

Claire is a good prof and she makes her classes engaging with lots of interaction and interactive activities. You definitely have to go to class and do the online modules before and after class but if you do them and apply her feedback it's not hard to do decently in the course.

Had her for 2 classes online, the modules were super clear, easy to follow. I had no idea how good I had it last semester, I didn't have to go searching around for what was due this week, just had to look at the module and it included everything. About her lectures, it's easy to participate, and she's not the most interesting person but was chill.
Claire is an amazing person and professor, but she is a tough marker. BRUSH UP ON YOUR ECOUTE BEFORE TAKING A CLASS WITH HER. half an exam is solely ecoute.
Very clear teaching style, very nice instructor. Would recommend!
She is very nice and willing to help students, she is my favorite prof of my whole life!

Definitely recommend her--she's extremely kind and caring, makes the material as understandable and interesting as possible, and is a very fair marker. I definitely learned a lot in her class--take French classes with her!
